gaps.description: The knowledge base lacks detailed coverage of the 2025 bipartisan infrastructure bill, including its fiscal impact, project rollouts, and stakeholder analyses.
gaps.research_topic: Compile a comprehensive report on the 2025 Infrastructure Bill: legislative history, budget allocations, projected economic effects, and key political negotiations.

gaps.description: Stale or missing information on post‑2024 climate legislation, such as the Clean Energy Transition Act and updated EPA regulations.
gaps.research_topic: Investigate and document all federal climate policy actions taken since 2023, including new statutes, executive orders, and regulatory changes affecting emissions, renewable energy incentives, and environmental justice.

gaps.description: No current data on AI regulation initiatives, federal AI research funding, or emerging legal frameworks addressing algorithmic bias.
gaps.research_topic: Research the latest U.S. federal policies, bills, and executive actions concerning artificial intelligence governance, focusing on transparency, accountability, and anti‑bias measures.

gaps.description: Outdated economic indicators (e.g., unemployment, inflation) and incomplete post‑COVID recovery statistics beyond 2023.
gaps.research_topic: Gather updated macroeconomic data for 2024–2025, including employment trends, inflation rates, and sectoral growth, with a focus on disparities among underrepresented groups.

gaps.description: Missing summaries of Supreme Court decisions issued in 2024‑2025 related to voting rights, civil liberties, and executive power.
gaps.research_topic: Compile a briefing on all U.S. Supreme Court rulings from 2024–2025 that impact election law, freedom of speech, or federal regulatory authority.
